item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:
Christy's on Orange
Their website:
http://www.christyson...

DRINK SPECIALS:
$0.50 off wine, well drinks and drafts

FOOD:
There will be some happy hour food out from 6-7 and I hope they will continue to bring some out for us to keep us there longer...

I said I would update them on the RSVPs Friday the 23rd, and numbers help the cause.

Contact info: Karen 203-535-8751

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...
Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.

Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Monday 11/26 Happy Hour -- Christy's on Orange
